Package me.mayhem.input

Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.input.InputManager
public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
The InputManager is a static factory that controls all the listeners in the project allowing the main loop in the Mayhem class to ping the correct classes with the correct events

    InputManager()

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.List<InputListener<?>> getListeners​(org.jsfml.window.event.Event.Type type)
    Gets all the InputListeners registered to the specified Event.Type
    static void registerInput​(InputListener<?> listener)
    Registers an InputListener to the Event.Types specified by the listener
    static void unregisterInput​(InputListener<?> listener)
    Unregisters an InputListener from all the Event.Types specified by itself

    • getListeners

      public static java.util.List<InputListener<?>> getListeners​(org.jsfml.window.event.Event.Type type)
      Gets all the InputListeners registered to the specified Event.Type
      Parameters:
      type - The type being looked up
      Returns:
      The List of listeners found that have been registered for that type
